title: NVIDIA 545.29.02 Linux Graphics Driver Is Out with Wayland Improvements, More
description:
NVIDIA 545.29.02 graphics driver for Linux is out now with support for the Night Light feature on GNOME and KDE Plasma desktops on Wayland, support to the NVIDIA VDPAU driver on Xwayland, and more.

The post NVIDIA 545.29.02 Linux Graphics Driver Is Out with Wayland Improvements, More appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
